Constructor & Destructor Documentation

cepDataset::cepDataset (  const string &    filename ) 
 

Constructor. Filename is the "root filename" e.g. mb_ANKR_GPS. I append the .dat1, .dat2 and .dat3 myself...

Parameters:
filename  the name of the data set to read, omitting the file extension
